passive.name: Sunfire Pulse
passive.description: Basic attacks deal bonus damage equal to 8% of the target's max HP.

passive.name: Star Rift

passive.name: Phase Charge

passive.name: Reaper's Blessing

passive.name: Burning Soul
passive.description: Skills inflict Burn for 2 turns.

passive.name: Lightburst

passive.name: Meteor Shower

passive.name: Graviton Impact

passive.name: Abyssal Venom

passive.name: Steel Resolve

passive.name: Icebrand

passive.name: Shock Bite

passive.name: Acceleration Drive

passive.name: Arcane Edge

passive.name: Soul Pierce

passive.name: Soundbreaker

passive.name: Phase Rift

passive.name: Forge Spirit

passive.name: Blood Harvest
passive.description: Critical hits heal for 15% of damage dealt.

passive.name: Chain Lightning

passive.name: Permafrost

passive.name: Toxic Strike
passive.description: 25% chance to poison on hit for 3 turns.

passive.name: Dragon's Fury

passive.name: Life Drain

passive.name: Shockwave

passive.name: Shadow Step
passive.description: 15% chance to attack twice.

passive.name: Solar Flare

passive.name: Mana Overload

passive.name: Divine Judgment

passive.name: Reality Tear
passive.description: Ignores 50% of enemy DEF.

passive.name: Rebirth Flame

passive.name: Soul Consumption

passive.name: Mjolnir's Wrath

passive.name: Glacial Prison

passive.name: Demonic Pact
passive.description: Gain 5% ATK per 10% missing HP (max 50%).

passive.name: Singularity

passive.name: Dragon's Dominance
passive.description: Deal 30% more damage and take 20% less damage from Beast/Creature enemies.

passive.description: Deal 25% more damage to Demon/Undead enemies and gain 15% damage reduction.

passive.name: Crimson Harvest

passive.name: End Times

passive.name: Supernova
passive.description: Skills deal 40% splash damage to all enemies.

passive.name: Chaotic Strike

passive.name: Final Strike
passive.description: First attack each battle deals 100% bonus damage and reduces all cooldowns by 2.

passive.name: Soul Drain
passive.description: On kill: Restore 15% HP and gain +10% ATK for 2 turns

passive.name: Toxic Strike

passive.name: Frozen Touch

passive.name: Ground Slam

passive.name: Backstab

passive.name: Thorns

passive.description: Gain +5% ATK per 10% HP lost (max +50%)

passive.name: Dimensional Rift

passive.name: Creation Strike

passive.name: Assassinate

passive.name: Divine Pierce

passive.name: Entropic Cascade
passive.description: Each spell cast increases Magic by +10% (stacks 5 times). Reset on taking damage

passive.name: Giant Killer
passive.description: Deal +3% damage per 100 HP the target has over you (max +100%)

passive.name: Soul Harvest
passive.description: Killing enemies permanently increases Magic by +2 for the battle

passive.name: Dragon's Dominion
passive.description: +50% damage vs Beast/Dragon factions. Immune to crowd control

passive.name: Temporal Shift

passive.name: Dark Pact

passive.name: Timeless Power
